attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
What happened to MERRY ENGLAND? Horse chestnut trees felled to stop children climbing for conkers. Public Xmas lights made unaffordable...
       Curb and haul back the well intentioned yet misguided and puritanical desire to impose Health and Safety Laws which restrict our actions to tackle relatively insignificant hazards at the expence of our happiness. Bring back freedom and restore MERRY ENGLAND!

rejection.details: The main sentence/title must be a call to action for HM Government not a name.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
